hopobject.name: Page
hopobject.body: One moment, please coupons for prilosec otc The idea of using personalized homepages to kick off your day’s web surfing is a holdover from another era – before tabbed browsing and always-on Internet connections became commonplace, and before tools to get quick hits of information, like Twitter or mobile apps, supplanted the need for portals filled with widgetized bits of data. The personalized homepage is decidedly a Web 2.0 product, and no amount of fresh paint can really change that.
